name: Bangin' Boxes
description:
A technical, mind-melting, puzzle game that will have your brain aching.

Bangin' Boxes is a puzzle game of forethought, timing and persistence that challenges you to put all of the stars into their own box and keep you think outside of it.

With the spirit of Sokoban and enchanting music by W.O.W Sound, Bangin' Boxes offers up forty-two mind-bending challenges to keep your brain churning for hours.

FREE for a limited time.
